text: Ceroplesis semitrabeata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Fairmaire in 1887. It is known from Malawi and Tanzania.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis semitrabeata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Varietas== * Ceroplesis semitrabeata var. puguana Fiedler, 1938 * Ceroplesis semitrabeata var. tomentosa Fiedler, 1938 ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1887
title: Ceroplesis semitrabeata
